item.title: jetson GStreamer Pipelines Capture_and_Display
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: IMX219-160 Camera - Waveshare Wiki NVIDIA Xavier - Capture and Display gst-launch-1.0 nvarguscamerasrc ! 'video/x-raw(memory:NVMM), width=(int)1920, height=(int)1080, format=(string)NV12, framerate=(fraction)30/1' ! nvoverlaysink Performance: Operation Mode CPU% GPU% FPS latency(ms) 0 (max performance) 0.0 4.92 30.01 114 1 (min power) 0.0 49.37 30.02 114 2 (default) 1.07 10.91 30.02 115 2592x1944@30 (native): gst-launch-1.0 nvarguscamerasrc ! 'video/x-raw(memory:NVMM), width=(int)2592, height=(int)1944, format=(string)NV12, framerate=(fraction)30/1' ! nvoverlaysink DISPLAY=:0.0 gst-launch-1.0 nvarguscamerasrc ! 'video/x-raw(memory:NVMM), width=3280, height=2464, format=(string)NV12, framerate=(fraction)20/1' ! nvoverlaysink -e
